text: @GregAbbott_TX Texas Governor Abbot has shown himself to so stupid & not incumbent in fighting Coronavirus. In place of issuing Hydroxychloroquine with Zinc Cold medicine to kill the virus, he takes the cowardly & lazy way out by asking for Deadly Facemasks & Hospitalizations.
